question: 辛子
sourceMnemonic: The <kanji>spicy</kanji> <kanji>child</kanji> is the child of spicy. So, not as spicy as mamma spicy, but still a bit spicy. This child spicy is <vocabulary>mustard</vocabulary>. Not too spicy, but not too mild.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading is <ja>辛い</ja> (<ja>からい</ja>) and the on'yomi reading for <ja>子</ja> combined together. It's one of those weird words that mixes the on'yomi and kun'yomi readings.
